text: Viktor Yakovlevich Potapov (; 29 March 1947 — 10 December 2017) was a Russian sailor. He was born in Dolgoprudny, Russia. He won a bronze medal in the Finn class at the 1972 Summer Olympics. Potapov died in Dolgoprudny on 10 December 2017 at the age of 70.НЕ СТАЛО ВИКТОРА ПОТАПОВА… ==References== ==Other websites== * Profile at sports-reference.com Category:1947 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Sailors
